thread.title: Shia LaBeouf arrested in Austin

title: Shia LaBeouf arrested in Austin
text:
Shia LaBeouf attends the 'Man Down' premiere during the Toronto International Film Festival on Sept. 15. (Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Images)
581 CONNECT 36 TWEET LINKEDIN 6 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Shia LaBeouf is in trouble with the law again.
Eyewitness photos and videos on Twitter show the actor being arrested in Austin, Texas on Friday evening, where the Austin City Limits music festival is taking place.
The 28-year-old actor was on 6th Street outside of a bar when he was arrested after police were called at 7:30 p.m., according to Entertainment Tonight. LaBeouf was taken into custody for public intoxication with no force.
Hey @TMZ just saw Shia Lebouf get arrested in Austin, TX ! pic.twitter.com/N81hMm5BzW
— Down To Friend (@DTFtx) October 10, 2015 According to TMZ, the star was "out of control and disobeyed police," who cuffed him. Local affiliate KVUE reports LaBeouf allegedly attempted to cross against a "Don't Walk" sign. Public intoxication is a misdemeanor charge.
Shia Labeouf just got arrested outside my bar lol pic.twitter.com/mYFoWx05Hf
— Kelsie Nugent (@kelsie_rae) October 10, 2015 LaBeouf sought treatment for alcohol addiction last year after being arrested outside of a Broadway performance of Cabaret and charged with criminal trespassing and disorderly conduct.
USA TODAY
Shia LaBeouf removed from Broadway theater, arrested
In March, a judge ordered the actor to spend three months in treatment and display six months of good behavior following the incident. In return, the charges would be dropped.
Representatives for LaBeouf did not immediately respond to request for comment.
USA TODAY
Shia LaBeouf injured on set of new movie
